# Copilot instructions

- Project: Node.js + TypeScript.
- Source: `src/`, build output: `dist/`.
- Always keep code `strict` TypeScript compatible.
- Use ESM imports.
- Preferred scripts:
  - build: `npm run build`
  - test: `npm test`
- Do not add new dependencies unless necessary; justify why.
- When changing behavior, update README and add/adjust tests.
